DOC.brief_summary: The goal multi-site clinical trial pilot test weekly SMS send parents/caregivers infant improve feeding practice decrease excessive weight gain infant participant Women , Infants Children ( WIC ) program Puerto Rico Hawaii . The intervention consist weekly SMS 4 month reinforce feed message provide WIC .
DOC.brief_title: Multi-site Trial Using SMS Improve Infant Weight
DOC.detailed_description: The goal multi-site clinical trial pilot test weekly SMS send parents/caregivers infant improve feeding practice decrease excessive weight gain infant participant WIC program two distinct location , Puerto Rico Hawaii ; assess acceptability practicality intervention ; assess acceptability collect blood spot future study . The investigator recruit convenience sample parent/caregivers infant 0-2 month participate WIC program Puerto Rico Hawaii send weekly SMS 4 month . The weekly message focus reinforce breastfeeding message provide WIC , prevent overfeeding , delay introduction solid food , delay reduce baby juice consumption , key issue low-income population . Participants complete validate questionnaire anthropometry trial result compare control group ( message ) . Participants also answer short question SMS different point interview end trial ass SMS . The investigator assess many participant agree collect blood spot infant future study .
DOC.criteria: Caregiver age 18 year old owner mobile phone unrestricted SMS capability responsible care infant willing actively participate full duration study . infant special diet infant limited mobility preterm birth ( < 37 week ) small large gestational age ( birthweight < 10th > 90th p ) inability consent participate study unwillingness randomize able read
